content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. May I know your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Mike! Could you please provide your address so I can check if we service your area?
Thank you! Let me check if we cover 789 Elm Street, Springfield.
I'm having trouble confirming if we service your address. I'll connect you with one of our human operators to assist further. Please hold on a moment.
reason: Agent unable to confirm service area for provided address.

content: Hello Mike, this is Edgar from XYZ Home Services. Sorry for the wait. Can you please confirm if your address 789 Elm Street is in Springfield or perhaps a nearby town? Sometimes the city name affects our service area lookup.
reason: Agent unable to confirm service area due to unclear location.

content: Oh, it's Springfield for sure, but sometimes mail gets mixed with Springfield Heights too. Which one do you need?
Thanks, Mike. Just to be thorough, can you provide your ZIP code? That will help me pinpoint your location.
Great, thanks! I’ve confirmed that 789 Elm Street, Springfield, 62704 is within our service area. Let me move forward with scheduling your plumbing service. What date and time work best for you?
I’m available next Tuesday afternoon around 2pm.
Checking the calendar for next Tuesday at 2pm...
The slot is available. I’m booking your appointment for Tuesday at 2pm. One moment please.
reason: Appointment successfully booked for plumbing service.

content: Your plumbing service is booked for next Tuesday at 2pm. We’ll send you a reminder closer to the date. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that’s all. Thanks for your help, Edgar!
